name: Blocked In (itch)
description:
Use your wits to clear every stage using blocks to reach the goal flag!

With progressively harder puzzles and more blocks to push every stage!

A game for block pushing lovers everywhere!

Push the block from one side of the room to the other!

Reach the flag to win!

Blocks look like this!          

Or sometimes also like this!    

Don't get them confused!

Block and roll!

Perfectly Normal Controls:

Z to jump

Arrows to move

R to reset!
